description: This Swift file defines the GameViewModel class responsible for managing the state and logic of a Tic-Tac-Toe game in an iOS app. It includes game state management, game logic such as detecting wins and draws, and provides methods and properties for UI binding.

classes.name: GameViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel class for handling game logic and state for Tic-Tac-Toe game.

methods.name: cellTitle(at:)
methods.description: Returns display title for the cell at a given index.

methods.name: tapCell(at:)
methods.description: Handles user tap on a cell, updating game state and checking for win/draw conditions.

methods.name: reset()
methods.description: Resets the game to initial state.
